items.name: The Heritage Canvas
items.short_description: A vibrant contemporary art gallery showcasing emerging Nigerian artists and hosting regular cultural events. Explore diverse expressions from across the nation.

items.name: Nexus VR Arena
items.short_description: Step into the future at Ibadan's premier VR and eSports lounge. Experience cutting-edge virtual reality games and competitive gaming setups for all skill levels.
items.address: The Palms Mall, Ring Road, Ibadan

items.name: Skyline Oasis Lounge
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of Ibadan while sipping craft cocktails and indulging in gourmet small bites. Perfect for sunsets and vibrant nightlife.
items.address: Top Floor, Heritage Mall, Dugbe, Ibadan

items.name: The Gourmand's Guild
items.short_description: A vibrant culinary marketplace featuring diverse food stalls, gourmet cafes, and pop-up restaurants. Discover new flavors and local delicacies in a modern setting.

items.name: Rainforest Ropes & Thrills
items.short_description: An eco-adventure park offering canopy walks, ziplining, and obstacle courses amidst a lush, natural landscape. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers.
items.address: Off Ibadan-Lagos Expressway, Near Guru Maharaji Ji Temple, Ibadan

items.name: The Screen Sanctuary
items.short_description: A luxurious boutique cinema offering a curated selection of local and international films, plush seating, and gourmet snacks for an elevated movie-watching experience.

items.name: Serenity Springs Wellness Centre
items.short_description: A tranquil urban oasis dedicated to holistic well-being. Offers yoga classes, spa treatments, meditation sessions, and a healthy eating cafe.
items.address: Plot 8, General Gas Road, Akobo, Ibadan

items.name: The Idea Hub & Cafe
items.short_description: A dynamic co-working space blending productivity with comfort. Features high-speed internet, private meeting rooms, and a gourmet coffee bar, perfect for freelancers and startups.

items.name: Ojo Eco-Park & Garden
items.short_description: A beautifully landscaped urban park featuring indigenous flora, walking trails, and serene picnic spots. Dedicated to environmental education and urban greening.

items.name: Innovateum Science Centre
items.short_description: An interactive science museum designed to spark curiosity in all ages. Features hands-on exhibits covering physics, technology, and environmental science.
items.address: Opposite Cocoa House, Bank Road, Dugbe, Ibadan
